description: This file defines a Flutter widget for editing notes, including UI elements for creating, updating, and deleting notes, and manages interactions with a notes repository.

classes.name: NoteEditorScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget that provides a UI for editing or creating a note.

classes.name: _NoteEditorScreenState
classes.description: State class for NoteEditorScreen, manages controllers and note editing logic.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes text controllers with the initial note's data.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of text controllers to free resources.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Saves the current note, either creating or updating it via the repository.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the current note after user confirmation.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the note editor page.
